name: Punky Skunk
description: Punky Skunk, known in Japan as Cooly Skunk (クーリースカンク, Kūrī Sukanku), is a 1996 platform video game originally developed by Ukiyotei and published in Japan by Visit for the original Sony PlayStation platform on November 1, 1996. Two years later, Jaleco USA localized it to North America. The game was originally going to be released for the Super Famicom in February 23, 1996 before being moved to PlayStation because of dying 16-bit markets.
